Detailed Description

The bot class.

Member Function Documentation

def GameObject::Bot::attack (   self,
  target 
)

Attack the specified unit.

Requires the calling robot to have an action and for the target to be in range

def GameObject::Bot::build (   self,
  type,
  x,
  y,
  size 
)

Begins building a new robot.

While building, the new robot will be a frame. Requires the calling robot to have an action. X and Y must cause the new robot to be adjacent. Size must be less than or equal to the calling robots size. Completes in 8 * size^2 / self.buildRate turns

def GameObject::Bot::combine (   self,
  bot2,
  bot3,
  bot4 
)

Combines four robots into one.

Requires all robots to have an action, be of the same size, and be arranged in a square

def GameObject::Bot::getX (   self  ) 

The X position of the top left corner of this object.

X is horizontal

Reimplemented from GameObject::Unit.

def GameObject::Bot::getY (   self  ) 

The Y position of the top left corner of this object.

Y is vertical

Reimplemented from GameObject::Unit.

def GameObject::Bot::heal (   self,
  target 
)

Heals the indicated bot.

Requires the calling robot to have an action and for the target to be in range. Heals for target.maxHealth * self.buildRate / (4 * target.size^2)

def GameObject::Bot::maxActions (   self  ) 

Returns the maximum number of actions this robot can take per turn.

def GameObject::Bot::maxSteps (   self  ) 

Returns the maximum number of steps this robot can take per turn.

def GameObject::Bot::move (   self,
  direction 
)

Move in the indicated direction (U, D, L, or R).

U is y=y-1, L=x=x-1, such that the top left corner is (0,0). Requires the calling robot to have a step.

def GameObject::Bot::split (   self  ) 

Splits a compound bot into the 4 robots that combined to make it.

Requires the calling robot to have an action.
